thread.title: "Jersey Shore's" Jenni 'JWoww' Farley Expecting Second Child
thread.title_full: "Jersey Shore's" Jenni 'JWoww' Farley Expecting Second Child

title: "Jersey Shore's" Jenni 'JWoww' Farley Expecting Second Child
text:
"Jersey Shore's" Jenni 'JWoww' Farley Expecting Second Child Posted today at 4:00pm 
Peter Kramer/NBC (NEW YORK) -- Jersey Shore 's Jenni "JWoww" Farley and Roger Mathews got married in New Jersey on Sunday, but that's not even the couple's biggest news -- they're expecting their second child together. 
The newlyweds confirmed the news to Us Weekly . "Baby No. 2 is official!! We are expecting and couldn't be more excited," the pair told the magazine in a statement. "A wedding that was beyond a dream come true and baby No. 2 on the way, we couldn't ask for more. We are on cloud nine!"Their new bundle of joy will be their second child; they're already parents to 15-month-old daughter, Meilani. She served as the flower girl at the couple's wedding on Sunday. 
Farley's former Jersey Shore co-stars Nicole “Snooki” Polizzi, Deena Cortese, and Sammi “Sweetheart” Giancola were all bridesmaids. Her other co-stars Vinny Guadagnino, DJ Pauly D, and Ronnie Ortiz-Magro were also on hand at their wedding, held at Addison Park in Keyport, New Jersey. 
Mathews proposed to Farley in September 2012, reportedly after the two went skydiving.
